    Utility class for working with CloudFormation stacks.

      • getUserDataFn

        public static com.scaleset.cfbuilder.core.Fn getUserDataFn(java.lang.String resource,
                                                           java.lang.String configsets,
                                                           CloudFormationModule cfnModule)
        Returns the FN userdata for the given resource and configsets.
        Parameters:
        resource - to which this userdata belongs
        configsets - name of the configsets for the resource
        cfnModule - belonging to the template
        Returns:
        Fn userdata for a resource

      • getUserDataDBConnFn

        public static com.scaleset.cfbuilder.core.Fn getUserDataDBConnFn(MysqlDatabase mysqlDatabase,
                                                                 java.lang.String sql)
        Returns a userdata Fn that installs mysql-client, executes the sql query on the MysqlDatabase and shuts down the machine afterwards.
        Parameters:
        mysqlDatabase - the MysqlDatabase the EC2 this Fn is for will connect to
        sql - the sql query that should be executed
        Returns:
        returns a Fn that a EC2 can set as userdata

      • getFileURL

        public static java.lang.String getFileURL(java.lang.String bucketName,
                                          java.lang.String objectKey)
        Returns the URL to the file in the given S3Bucket. e.g. http://bucketName.s3.amazonaws.com/objectKey
        Parameters:
        bucketName - name of the bucket containing the file
        objectKey - key belonging to the file in the bucket
        Returns:
        URL for the file
